description:
It`s the year 199x, and the world is enveloped in the fires of a nuclear holocaust. On the charred remains of the earth`s surface, few remaining groups of humans are struggling to survive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: God or Devil!? The Mightiest Man Appears in Hell
Kami ka Akuma ka!? Jigoku ni Arawareta Saikyou no Otoko
Ken, l’héritier de la Grande Ourse
神か悪魔か!? 地獄にあらわれた最強の男
